item.description:

  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: PACKAGE WAS SEEN WET WHEN MANAGER OPENED TRAILER TO UNLOAD. PACKAGE CONTAINED IN BUCKET WITH HAZ BAG DescribePack: LOOSE CAP ON 1 BOTTLE AND NO CAP ON 1 BOTTLE DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: PACKAGE CONTAINED IN BUCKET WITH HAZ BAG AND FOLD ABSORB PAD
